title: Workshop on Collaborative Information Seeking and Knowledge Building Through Game Design

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in fundamental digital tools and general understanding of gaming culture
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, applying a formative assessment-focused feedback system

learning_goals: Learners can effectively apply collaborative information-seeking strategies at 80% or higher through game design projects
Learners can solve programming assignments at over 70% proficiency using wiki-based LMS resources in a problem-based learning environment
Learners can document the knowledge-building process at over 90% proficiency by utilizing social interaction tools (comments, shared documents, etc.) through team-based activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
